items.title: Gainers & Losers: 10 stocks that moved the most on July 4
items.description: Sensex rose over 193 points (0.23 percent) to close at 83,433. Nifty meanwhile gained around 56 points (0.22 percent) to end the session at 25,461.

items.title: Taking Stock: Nifty closes above 25,450, Sensex rises 193 pts amid volatility
items.description: Bajaj Finance, Infosys, Dr Reddy's Labs, ICICI Bank, HUL were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers included Trent, Tata Steel, Eicher Motors, Tech Mahindra and IndusInd Bank.

items.title: Live: Nifty stages recovery from lows, reclaims 25,450 | Closing Bell
items.description: Nifty Recovers Over 100 Pts From Day's Low. Sensex Recoups Over 400 Pts From Day's Low. Nifty Metal, Auto Indices Sulk. Oil & Gas, It Stocks Perform Well. Smallcap, Midcap Indices Lack Ethusiasm. Nifty 50 Gainers: Bajaj Finance, Infy, Wipro. Nifty 50 Losers: Trent, Tata Steel, Eicher Motors. Nifty Snaps 2-week Rally, Down 1(%) This Week. Bank Nifty Underperforms Benchmark This Week. Nifty Realty Top Sectoral Laggard This Week. Fmcg, Private Banks Sulk This Week. Nifty Pharma, Psu Bank Top Sectoral Winners. Defence Stocks On The Uptrend This Week. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Aamar Deo Singh, Sr Vice President, Angelone to navigate market movement.

items.title: Medical devices maker Polymed eyes global expansion with new plants, strategic M&A
items.description: Polymed has set an ambitious target to grow its US revenue to ;$20-25 million opportunity' within the next three to four years, driven by new contracts and FDA approvals.

items.title: Jane Street likely to face more SEBI orders in coming days: Sources
items.description: As per one source, SEBI is further investigating the trades of Jane Street group in indices like Sensex, Fin Nifty, Bankex, Nifty IT Index, Nifty Midcap Index and other stock options

items.title: IGL, MGL shares rise up to 3% after PNGRB approves reforms in Natural Gas Pipeline Tariff Regulations
items.description: As part of the reforms, unified tariff zones have been reduced to two from three previously.

items.title: Jane Street’s 'illegal' strategy made other algo firms wary of taking positions on expiry days, say experts
items.description: The SEBI order has sent a strong signal to all HFT firms that bend the rules to make extra profits while making it tough for genuine market participants, say market experts.

items.title: Nifty Realty snaps 6-day losing streak, rises 1% on value-buying; Raymond Realty, DLF among top gainers
items.description: Nifty Realty index climbed 0.97 percent during the trade, recovering from a nearly 6 percent fall in the previous six sessions.

items.title: Newly-listed HDB Financial shares drop 2%, snap two-day rally: Should you buy?
items.description: HDB Financial share price: The shares of the NBFC had gained 17% during its two-day rally since market debut on July 2.

items.title: Jane Street has over Rs 15,000 cr locked in G-secs as margin, paving way for SEBI’s Rs 4,843-cr impounding: Sources
items.description: As per SEBI interim order,Jane Street, made a total profit of Rs 36,502.12 crores across all segments during January 2023 and March 2025.

items.title: Poonawalla Fincorp, CreditAccess Grameen shares gain on strong Q1 business updates; Bandhan Bank slips 3%
items.description: The three companies released business updates for the first quarter of the financial year 2026 (April 2025 to June 2025).

items.title: Infosys shares gain marginally; over 9 lakh shares traded
items.description: In summary, Infosys shares showed a marginal gain in today's trading session, with significant trading volume and recent corporate announcements including dividends and bonus issues.

items.title: Indraprastha Gas shares rise 2.06% on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: At 11:26 am, the stock showed positive movement, driven by bullish investor sentiment.

items.title: ITC shares trade flat in today's session; over 19.7 lakh shares traded
items.description: In summary, ITC shares traded flat in Friday's session with over 19.7 lakh shares traded, and the company's financial performance shows positive trends in revenue and mixed trends in profitability.

items.title: Bharti Airtel shares fall marginally in today's session; over 5.4 lakh shares traded
items.description: With the stock currently trading at Rs 2,009.70, Bharti Airtel reflects a slight downturn amidst overall positive financial performance and very bullish market sentiment.

items.title: BSE Limited share price falls 5.29%; among top losers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: BSE Limited has seen a decline in today's trading session, with the stock currently priced at Rs 2,670.80, making it among the top losers on the Nifty Midcap 150.

items.title: Ola Electric, Mankind Pharma stocks among top gainers on Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: These companies' financial performances reflect varied results in their most recent quarters and years.

items.title: Sapphire Foods shares rise 9% as report says company may merge into Devyani International
items.description: Yum! Brands, the American owner of popular food chains KFC and Pizza Hut, is in talks to facilitate the merger of its two franchisee partners in India, Devyani International and Sapphire Foods, The Economic Times reported.

items.title: Angel One shares decline 6% as gross client acquisition falls 42% YoY in June
items.description: Nifty Capital Markets index was down 2 percent, with Angel One, BSE and CDSL among the top losers.

items.title: Paras Defence, BEML, BDL, other defence stocks rally up to 9% after DAC clears Rs 1.05-lakh crore defence purchases
items.description: Defence stocks: Paras Defence shares rallied 9% after turning ex-split.

items.title: Strong market debut: Adcounty Media India shares list at 53% premium to SME IPO price
items.description: Adcounty Media share price: The listing premium is higher than the 47.06% GMP with which unlisted shares of the company were trading in the grey market, ahead of listing.

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick: Why this frontline defence stock still offers value
items.description: Steady improvement in execution to drive earnings growth
